Class JkUtilsZip

java.lang.Object

public final class JkUtilsZip
extends java.lang.Object

Low level utility method to deal with zip files.

Method Detail

unzip

public static void unzip(java.lang.Iterable<java.io.File> zips,
                         java.io.File folder)
Unzip the specified zip files into the specified directory. If the specified directory doen snot exist, it is created.

unzip

public static void unzip(java.io.File zip,
                         java.io.File directory)
Unzip the specified zip file into the specified directory. If the specified directory doen snot exist, it is created.

addZipEntry

public static void addZipEntry(java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream zos,
                               java.io.File fileToZip,
                               java.io.File baseFolder)
Adds a zip entry into the provided ZipOutputStream. The zip entry is the part of filePathToZip truncated with the baseFolderPath.

So a file or folder c:\my\base\folder\my\file\to\zip.txt will be added in archive using my/file/to/zip.txt entry.

addZipEntry

public static void addZipEntry(java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream zos,
                               java.io.File fileToZip,
                               java.io.File baseFolder,
                               boolean storeMethod)
Adds a zip entry into the provided ZipOutputStream. The zip entry is the part of filePathToZip truncated with the baseFolderPath.

So a file or folder c:\my\base\folder\my\file\to\zip.txt will be added in archive using my/file/to/zip.txt entry.

addZipEntry

public static void addZipEntry(java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream zos,
                               java.io.File fileOrFolderToZip,
                               java.io.File baseFolder,
                               boolean storeMethod,
                               JkUtilsZip.JkZipEntryFilter filter)
Same as addZipEntry(ZipOutputStream, File, File, boolean) but with the possibility to filter zip entries to excludes somes.

readZipEntry

public static java.util.zip.ZipInputStream readZipEntry(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                                        java.lang.String caseInsensitiveEntryName)
Reads the specified zip stream and position it at the beginning of the specified entry. The specified entry is case insensitive. An exception is thrown if no such entry exist.

readZipEntryOrNull

public static java.util.zip.ZipInputStream readZipEntryOrNull(java.io.File zipFile,
                                                              java.lang.String caseInsensitiveEntryName)
As #readZipEntry(File, String) but returns null instead of throwing an exception if no such entry exist.

zipEntries

public static java.util.List<java.util.zip.ZipEntry> zipEntries(java.util.zip.ZipFile zipFile)
Returns all zip entry of the specified zip file.

zipEntryIgnoreCase

public static java.util.zip.ZipEntry zipEntryIgnoreCase(java.util.zip.ZipFile zipFile,
                                                        java.lang.String entryName)
Returns the zip entry havinbf a name equals ignoring case to the specified one.

zipFile

public static java.util.zip.ZipFile zipFile(java.io.File file)
Creates a ZipFile from file without checked exception.

readZipEntryOrNull

public static java.util.zip.ZipInputStream readZipEntryOrNull(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                                                              java.lang.String caseInsensitiveEntryNAme)
Reads the specified zip stream and position it at the beginning of the specified entry. The specified entry is case insensitive. It returns null if no such entry exist.
